name: Patient
definition: Demographics and other administrative information about an individual receiving care or other health-related services.

name: Practitioner
definition: A person who is directly or indirectly involved in the provisioning of healthcare; e.g. doctor, dentist, nurse, technician, IT personnel

name: PractitionerRole
definition: A specific set of Roles/Locations/specialties/services that a practitioner may perform at an organization for a period of time. Similar to but more generic than CareTeam.

name: RelatedPerson
definition: Information about a person that is involved in the care for a patient, but who is not the target of care themselves; e.g. spouse, relative, friend, etc.

name: Person
definition: Demographics and administrative information about a person independent of a specific health-related context. Person instances are never directly referenced as actors (authors, subjects, performers, etc.), and therefore SHALL NOT be referenced by any other clinical or administrative resources.

name: Group
definition: Represents a defined collection of entities that may be discussed or acted upon collectively but which are not expected to act collectively, and are not formally or legally recognized; i.e. a collection of entities that isn't an Organization.

name: Organization
definition: A formally or informally recognized grouping of people or organizations formed for the purpose of achieving some form of collective action. Includes companies, institutions, corporations, departments, community groups, healthcare practice groups, payer/insurer, etc.

name: OrganizationAffiliation
definition: Defines an affiliation/assotiation/relationship between 2 organizations, that is not a part-of relationship; e.g. An organization may be a member of, or provide services to, an association, but not owned by it

name: HealthcareService
definition: The details of a healthcare service available at a location; e.g. Pharmacy, drug counciling, social support, psychology services

name: Endpoint
definition: The technical details of an endpoint that can be used for electronic services, such as for web services providing XDS.b or a REST endpoint for another FHIR server. This may include any security context information. Similar to, but more narrow than, CapabilityStatement which describes the entire server.

name: Location
definition: Details and position information for a physical place where services are provided and resources and participants may be stored, found, contained, or accommodated; e.g. building, freezer, home, parking place, etc.

name: Substance
definition: A homogeneous material with a definite composition. Could be the ingrediant(s) of a Medication.

name: BiologicallyDerivedProduct
definition: A material substance originating from a biological entity intended to be transplanted or infused into another (possibly the same) biological entity.

name: Device
definition: A type of a manufactured item that is used in the provision of healthcare without being substantially changed through that activity. The device may be a medical or non-medical device. Meant to describe the actual physical device whereas DeviceDefinition is the ""catelog entry"".

name: DeviceMetric
definition: Describes a measurement, calculation or setting capability of a medical device.

name: Task
definition: A task to be performed; e.g. cancelling an order; admitting a patient. Often exists in parallel with clinical resources like ServiceRequest that would result in a Procedure, DiagnosticReport, etc.

name: Appointment
definition: A booking of a healthcare event among patient(s), practitioner(s), related person(s) and/or device(s) for a specific date/time. This may result in one or more Encounter(s). Used to make Appointment requests that get responded to by AppointmentResponse. Appointment.status gets updated once all AppointmentResponses are collated.

name: AppointmentResponse
definition: A reply to an appointment request for a patient and/or practitioner(s), such as a confirmation or rejection.

name: Schedule
definition: A container for slots of time that may be available for booking appointments.

name: Slot
definition: A slot of time on a schedule that may be available for booking appointments. These are effectively spaces of free/busy time.

name: VerificationResult
definition: Describes validation requirements, source(s), status and dates for one or more elements.

name: Encounter
definition: An interaction between a patient and healthcare provider(s) for the purpose of providing healthcare service(s) or assessing the health status of a patient. Classification (Encounter.class) is mandatory to specify location; e.g. ambulatory, virtual, acute, etc.

name: EpisodeOfCare
definition: An association between a patient and an organization / healthcare provider(s) during which time encounters may occur -- a container that can link a series of Encounters together for problems/issues.

name: Flag
definition: A warning that is relevant to the care of a patient. Something more significant than a typical note; e.g. clinical trial participant, overdue account, ebola outbreak.

name: List
definition: A curated collection of resources.

name: Library
definition: The Library resource is a general-purpose container for knowledge asset definitions. It can be used to describe and expose existing knowledge assets such as logic libraries and information model descriptions, as well as to describe a collection of knowledge assets; e.g. CQL query library, base64 images

name: AllergyIntolerance
definition: Risk of harmful or undesirable, physiological response which is unique to an individual and associated with exposure to a substance.

name: AdverseEvent
definition: Actual or potential/avoided event causing unintended physical injury resulting from or contributed to by medical care, a research study or other healthcare setting factors that requires additional monitoring, treatment, or hospitalization, or that results in death.

name: Condition
definition: A clinical condition, problem, diagnosis, or other event, situation, issue, or clinical concept that has risen to a level of concern; e.g. unemployed, fear of cancer, risk of Zika, anorexia

name: Procedure
definition: An action that is or was performed on or for a patient. This can be a physical intervention like a surgery, or less invasive like providing counseling.

name: FamilyMemberHistory
definition: Significant health conditions for a person related to the patient relevant in the context of care for the patient.

name: ClinicalImpression
definition: A record of a clinical assessment performed to determine what problem(s) may affect the patient and before planning the treatments or management strategies that are best to manage a patient's condition.

name: DetectedIssue
definition: Indicates an actual or potential clinical issue with or between one or more active or proposed clinical actions for a patient; e.g. Drug-drug interaction, Ineffective treatment frequency, Procedure-condition conflict, etc.

name: Observation
definition: Measurements and simple assertions made about a patient, device, or other subject.

name: Media
definition: A photo, video, or audio recording acquired or used in healthcare. The actual content may be inline or provided by direct reference.

name: DiagnosticReport
definition: The findings and interpretation of diagnostic tests performed on patients, groups of patients, devices, and locations, and/or specimens derived from these.

name: Specimen
definition: A sample to be used for analysis; can be biological or physical/environmental

name: BodyStructure
definition: Record of an anatomical structure.

name: ImagingStudy
definition: Representation of the content produced in a DICOM imaging study. Provides information on a DICOM imaging study, and the series and imaging objects in that study.

name: QuestionnaireResponse
definition: A structured set of questions and answers.

name: MolecularSequence
definition: A sequence of nucleotides or amino acids.

name: MedicationRequest
definition: An order or request for both supply of the medication and the instructions for administration of the medication to a patient.

name: MedicationAdministration
definition: Describes the event of a patient consuming or otherwise being administered a medication; e.g. swallowing a table, infusion, etc.

name: MedicationDispense
definition: Indicates that a medication product is to be, or has been, dispensed for a named person/patient. This includes a description of the medication product (supply) provided and the instructions for administering the medication.

name: MedicationStatement
definition: A record of a medication that is being taken by a patient. Can be past, present, or future. Less specific than MedicationAdministration.

name: Medication
definition: This resource is primarily used for the identification and definition of a medication for the purposes of prescribing, dispensing, and administering a medication as well as for making statements about medication use.

name: MedicationKnowledge
definition: Information about a medication that is used to support knowledge. Can be used to return drug information as part of a formulary or a catalogue.

name: Immunization
definition: Describes the event of a patient being administered a vaccine or a record of an immunization as reported by a patient, a clinician or another party.

name: ImmunizationEvaluation
definition: Describes a comparison of an immunization event against published recommendations to determine if the administration is ""valid"" in relation to those recommendations.

name: ImmunizationRecommendation
definition: A patient's point-in-time set of recommendations (i.e. forecasting) according to a published schedule with optional supporting justification.

name: CarePlan
definition: Describes the intention of how one or more practitioners intend to deliver care for a particular patient, group or community for a period of time, possibly limited to care for a specific condition or set of conditions. They can be as simple as a general practitioner keeping track of a scheduled vaccination to a detailed plan for an oncology patient covering diet, chemotherapy, and counseling.

name: CareTeam
definition: The Care Team includes all the people and organizations who plan to participate in the coordination and delivery of care for a patient.

name: Goal
definition: Describes the intended objective(s) for a patient, group or organization care, for example, weight loss, restoring an activity of daily living, obtaining herd immunity via immunization, meeting a process improvement objective, etc.

name: ServiceRequest
definition: A record of a request for service such as diagnostic investigations, treatments, or operations to be performed.

name: NutritionOrder
definition: A request to supply a diet, formula, or nutritional supplement to a patient.

name: VisionPrescription
definition: A prescription for glasses or contact lenses.

name: RiskAssessment
definition: An assessment of the likely outcome(s) for a patient or other subject as well as the likelihood of each outcome; e.g. prognosis for a condition; risk of heart attack, etc.

name: RequestGroup
definition: A group of related requests that can be used to capture intended activities that have inter-dependencies such as ""give this medication after that one"".

name: Communication
definition: An occurrence of information being transmitted; e.g. an alert that was sent to a responsible provider, a public health agency that was notified about a reportable condition.

name: CommunicationRequest
definition: A request to convey information; e.g. the CDS system proposes that an alert be sent to a responsible provider, the CDS system proposes that the public health agency be notified about a reportable condition.

name: DeviceRequest
definition: A request for a patient to use or be given a device. The device may be an implantable device, or an external assistive device, such as a walker.

name: DeviceUseStatement
definition: A record of a device being used by a patient where the record is the result of a report from the patient or another clinician.

name: GuidanceResponse
definition: Used to represent the result of invoking a decision support service. It provides a container for the status of the response, any warnings or messages returned by the service, as well as any output data from the service and any suggested actions to be performed.

name: SupplyRequest
definition: A record of a request for a medication, substance or device used in the healthcare setting. Used for inventory management, not patient care.

name: SupplyDelivery
definition: Record of delivery of what is supplied.

name: Coverage
definition: Financial instrument which may be used to reimburse or pay for health care products and services. Includes both insurance and self-payment. Typically the information which would appear on an insurance card.

name: CoverageEligibilityRequest
definition: A request to the insurer to determine if a patient is eligible for coverage.

name: CoverageEligibilityResponse
definition: A response to a request to determine if a patient is eligible for coverage.

name: EnrollmentRequest
definition: A request to enroll a patient in a health plan.

name: EnrollmentResponse
definition: A response to a request to enroll a patient in a health plan.

name: Claim
definition: A provider issued list of professional services and products which have been provided, or are to be provided, to a patient which is sent to an insurer for reimbursement.

name: ClaimResponse
definition: The adjudicated response to a Claim, Predetermination or Preauthorization.

name: Invoice
definition: A request for payment for goods and services rendered.

name: PaymentNotice
definition: Provides the status of the payment for goods and services rendered, and the request and response resource references.

name: PaymentReconciliation
definition: Serves to correlate a payment amount to the adjudicated claim amounts appearing on one or more ClaimResponses. Provides the bulk payment details associated with a payment by the payor.

name: Account
definition: A financial tool for tracking value accrued for a particular purpose. In the healthcare field, used to track charges for a patient, cost centers, etc.

name: ChargeItem
definition: A record of a charge for a good or service.

name: ChargeItemDefinition
definition: The properties of a billing code to be used in charge item resources.

name: Contract
definition: A legally enforceable agreement between parties.

name: ExplanationOfBenefit
definition: Provides the claim details; adjudication details from the processing of a Claim; and optionally account balance information, for informing the subscriber of the benefits provided.

name: InsurancePlan
definition: Details of a health insurance product/plan.

name: ResearchStudy
definition: A process of investigation that involves subjects and which is designed to answer a scientific question; e.g. safety/efficacy studies for meds/devices. Could be humans or animals.

name: ResearchSubject
definition: A person or animal that is the subject of a research study.

name: ActivityDefinition
definition: This resource allows for the definition of some activity/step to be performed, independent of a particular patient, practitioner, or other performance context.

name: DeviceDefinition
definition: The characteristics, operational status and capabilities of a medical-related component of a medical device.

name: EventDefinition
definition: The EventDefinition resource provides a reusable description of when a particular event can occur.

name: ObservationDefinition
definition: Set of definitional characteristics for a kind of observation or measurement produced or consumed by an orderable health care service.

name: PlanDefinition
definition: The definition of a plan for a series of nested actions (often ActivityDefinitions), independent of any specific patient or context; e.g. procedure protocol

name: Questionnaire
definition: A structured set of questions intended to guide the collection of answers from end-users. Provide detailed control over order, presentation, phraseology and grouping to allow coherent, consistent data collection.

name: SpecimenDefinition
definition: A kind of specimen with associated set of requirements.

name: ResearchDefinition
definition: Describes the conditional state (population and any exposures being compared within the population) and outcome (if specified) that the knowledge (evidence, assertion, recommendation) is about.

name: ResearchElementDefinition
definition: "Describes a ""PICO"" element that knowledge (evidence

name: Evidence
definition: Describes the conditional state (population and any exposures being compared within the population) and outcome (if specified) that the knowledge (evidence, assertion, recommendation) is about.

name: EvidenceVariable
definition: "Describes a ""PICO"" element that knowledge (evidence

name: EffectEvidenceSynthesis
definition: Describes the difference in an outcome between exposures states in a population where the effect estimate is derived from a combination of research studies.

name: RiskEvidenceSynthesis
definition: Describes the likelihood of an outcome in a population plus exposure state where the risk estimate is derived from a combination of research studies.

name: Measure
definition: A quality measure definition.

name: MeasureReport
definition: The MeasureReport resource contains the results of the calculation of a measure; and optionally a reference to the resources involved in that calculation.

name: TestScript
definition: A structured set of tests against a FHIR server or client implementation to determine compliance against the FHIR specification.

name: TestReport
definition: A report of a test.

name: MedicinalProduct
definition: Detailed information for a medicinal product.

name: MedicinalProductAuthorization
definition: The regulatory authorization of a medicinal product.

name: MedicinalProductContraindication
definition: The clinical particulars - contraindications.

name: MedicinalProductIndication
definition: The clinical particulars - indications.

name: MedicinalProductInteraction
definition: The clinical particulars - interactions.

name: MedicinalProductManufactured
definition: The manufactured item as contained in the packaged medicinal product.

name: MedicinalProductPackaged
definition: A medicinal product in a container or package.

name: MedicinalProductPharmaceutical
definition: A pharmaceutical product described in terms of its composition and dose form.

name: MedicinalProductUndesirableEffect
definition: The clinical particulars - undesirable effects.

name: SubstanceNucleicAcid
definition: Nucleic acids are defined by three distinct elements: the base, sugar and linkage.

name: SubstancePolymer
definition: Properties of a substance polymer.

name: SubstanceProtein
definition: A substance protein.

name: SubstanceReferenceInformation
definition: Todo.

name: SubstanceSourceMaterial
definition: Source material for a substance.

name: SubstanceSpecification
definition: The specification of a substance.

name: CapabilityStatement
definition: A statement of the capabilities of a FHIR server that may be used as a statement of actual server functionality or a statement of required or desired server implementation.

name: StructureDefinition
definition: A definition of a FHIR structure. Used to describe the underlying resources, data types defined in FHIR, and also for describing extensions and constraints on resources and data types.

name: ImplementationGuide
definition: A set of rules about how FHIR resources are used.

name: SearchParameter
definition: A search parameter that can be used to search for resources.

name: MessageDefinition
definition: Defines the characteristics of a message that can be shared between systems, including the type of event that initiates the message, the content to be transmitted and what response(s), if any, are permitted.

name: OperationDefinition
definition: A definition of an operation that can be performed on a resource.

name: CompartmentDefinition
definition: Defines how resources are accessed on a server.

name: StructureMap
definition: A Map of relationships between 2 structures that can be used to transform data; e.g. CDA document to set of FHIR resources

name: GraphDefinition
definition: A formal computable definition of a graph of resources - that is, a coherent set of resources that form a graph by following references. The Graph Definition resource defines a set and makes rules about the set.

name: ExampleScenario
definition: An example of a FHIR message exchange.

name: CodeSystem
definition: Used to declare the existence of and describe a code system or code system supplement and its key properties, and optionally define a part or all of its content.

name: ValueSet
definition: Specifies a set of codes drawn from one or more code systems

name: ConceptMap
definition: Defines a mapping from a set of concepts defined in a code system to one or more concepts defined in other code systems; e.g. SNOMED to ICD-10

name: NamingSystem
definition: A system of unique identifiers for resources.

name: TerminologyCapabilities
definition: A statement of the capabilities of a terminology server.

name: Provenance
definition: Tracks information about the activity that created, revised, deleted, or signed a version of a resource, describing the entities and agents involved. This information can be used to form assessments about its quality, reliability, trustworthiness, or to provide pointers for where to go to further investigate the origins of the resource and the information in it.

name: AuditEvent
definition: A record of an event for purposes of security analysis; e.g. intrusion attempts, inappropriate use

name: Consent
definition: A record of a patient’s choices, which permits or denies identified recipient(s) or recipient role(s) to perform one or more actions within a given policy context, for specific purposes and periods of time.

name: Composition
definition: A set of resources composed into a single coherent clinical statement, such as a discharge summary.

name: DocumentManifest
definition: A list of documents that are related to each other (including metadata), and which maybe treated as a whole.

name: DocumentReference
definition: A reference to a document of any kind for any purpose. Provides metadata about the document; e.g. metadata for: CDA docs, PDFs, Image files

name: CatalogEntry
definition: An entry in a catalog.

name: Basic
definition: A resource that can be used to represent any concept that does not have a defined resource type. A placeholder.

name: Binary
definition: A resource that contains any kind of data in a binary format; e.g. text, image, pdf, zip, etc. Typically referred to from other resources.

name: Bundle
definition: A container for a collection of resources; e.g. result of search/history

name: Linkage
definition: Identifies two or more records (resource instances) that refer to the same real-world ""occurrence""; e.g. multiple Condition records that refer to the same underlying problem/issue for a Patient

name: MessageHeader
definition: The header for a message exchange that is either requesting or responding to an action.

name: OperationOutcome
definition: A collection of error, warning, or information messages that result from a system action.

name: Parameters
definition: This resource is a non-persisted resource used to pass information into and back from an operation. It has no other use, and there is no RESTful endpoint associated with it.

name: Subscription
definition: Used to define a push-based subscription from a server to another system. Once a subscription is registered with the server, the server checks every resource that is created or updated, and if the resource matches the given criteria, it sends a message on the defined channel so that another system can take an appropriate action.
